title: Ticket #4577: cleaning of execute directory should ignore lost+found
description:
Suggestion from rust user:

I have the scratch space mounted as its own partition, and as such has a lost+found directory in it. It appears that the daemons remove this directory when cleaning up the scratch space. Could the lost+found be exempted from removal? Obviously in scratch space it's not an important consideration since recovered files would be deleted anyway, but the fsck at boot keeps complaining that it's not there. Consider it a feature request, perhaps.
